Quiz.question: 1 Part III: Interpreting the Findings Select the correct option, and click the Submit button. According to calculations, most SeaBees received an estimated dose of 438 mrem/year. With this information, what do you consider the risk to be for the SeaBee personnel? Part III: Interpreting the Findings Urgent! The base Commander asked for a progress report on your team's work, and has determined that you have received additional points for the progress made on your mission. You have been awarded 50 pts for every hour that your team is ahead of schedule. The mission schedule dictates that there should be 17 hours left at this point. The increased risk of long-term fatal cancer is 1:4,000 The increased risk of long-term fatal cancer is 1:400 The increased risk of long-term fatal cancer is negligible 1
